segments.text: You know that this job requires frequent business travel . Can you accept it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mostly short business trips , but sometimes long ones are also needed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then how about the expenses during the trips ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The company will pay all the expenses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me where we often travel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually Shanghai , Qingdao , Hong Kong and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's great ! I like these places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you need to go abroad once in a while . Can you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After the business trip , you could apply for reimbursement of all the expenses , such as passage money and accommodation charges and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take a break for one or two weeks after you have a business trip every time , which depends on the circumstances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Thank you very much for telling me all these things .
segments.speaker: S2
